des:
The SimplySmart Home by Switchmate Alexa Skill gives you the ability to control all your Switchmate and SimplySmart Home devices to control your smart home through your Alexa!

Requires: A Switchmate Bridge Device (SWM Power, Zip, or Zip Siren)

Simply open your Switchmate app, go to Settings, and select "Link Alexa" - from there it will provide a linking code which will transmit all your devices in your Switchmate app to your Alexa for easy control.
